company.name: Triex Technologies, Inc.
company.description: An established leader in test tools manufacturing and development, Triex Technologies provides you with top quality electrical and mechanical engineering solutions.

hero.headline: Embedded Engineering Consulting
hero.subheadline: Add engineers to your team and get your project done.

about.headline: About Triex Technologies
about.content: Triex Technologies, Inc. was founded in 2007 to provide you with top-quality automated test and consulting solutions. Since then, we have become an established leader in test tools manufacturing and development. Industry leaders trust us to provide design, build, and manufacturing solutions. We are committed to making you happy about giving us your business.
